code: export var highlightReward=function highlightReward(currentIndex,index){if(currentIndex!==null){var range=currentIndex-index;if(range>0){return'gray';}else if(range<0){return'black';}else{return'yellow';}}return undefined;};export var formatNumberWithCommas=function formatNumberWithCommas(number){return number.toLocaleString('en-US');};
